list.url: http://www.epochtimes.com/gb/12/3/6/n3531176.htm奥巴马奋战亚洲鲤-今年斥资5150万治理
list.abs: 大头鲢（Bighead carp）可长到超过120厘米，重达40公斤。银鲤可重达20公斤。
俗称大头鱼(bighead carp),是我国最主要的养殖鱼类之一。广泛分布于亚洲东部,我国各大水系均有此鱼。
自大英语怎么说?_百度知道 ... self-esteem 自尊, 自负, 自大, 自尊心 bighead 自大 self-conceit 自负, 自大.
胖字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 胖乎乎〖 plump;chubby;pudgy;fat〗 胖头鱼〖 bighead〗 胖子〖 fatperson;fatty〗.

entry.def: If you describe someone as big-headed, you disapprove of them because they think they are very clever and know everything.

example.tran: 傲慢的、自以为是的男人

means.word_mean: 1. used colloquially of one who is overly conceited or arrogant;

sentences.sentence: "a snotty little scion of a degenerate family"-Laurent Le Sage
